title: 5.6 Update doesn't work?
body: I'm trying to update my LoL-Launcher. But somehow my downloadrate is 1-14 KB per sec. I checked my internet connection. Everything works fine but the update doesn't work. Even after I restarted my computer, I had the same problem. Any suggestions to solve this problem?

replies.body: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/J80MQrVL-league-of-legends-downloadupdate-0kbps-fix Maybe I can help chu c;

Hey Mister Plumbum!

If your connection is dropping that low, or even hitting 0%, there is either an issue with the patcher itself, or possibly a connection setting that is throttling your connection.  Because of this, make sure that you try completing all of the different steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first.  Yes, there are quite a bit there, but they do commonly resolve these slow download issues in the patcher.

If the steps still haven't jacked up your download speed, make sure to respond back to me and let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qA0OJfjh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-25T23:23:10.246+0000)
>
> Hey Mister Plumbum!
> 
> If your connection is dropping that low, or even hitting 0%, there is either an issue with the patcher itself, or possibly a connection setting that is throttling your connection.  Because of this, make sure that you try completing all of the different steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first.  Yes, there are quite a bit there, but they do commonly resolve these slow download issues in the patcher.
> 
> If the steps still haven't jacked up your download speed, make sure to respond back to me and let me know!

i would have agreed if it didn't do the same thing to me, eat up 95% of my cpu, and then shoot me an "unidentified error has occurred" , and then get stuck at 33% with 5000+ files scanned.

Hmmm...if its taking up that much CPU as well as getting stuck on that many scanned files, this seemed like there is a corruption with the patcher itself.  To that end, make sure to check off all of the steps in our Patcher Issues Article.  It should help in getting that resolved and into the client ASAP!

If for whatever reason it is still denying you, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists should be able to investigate further and figure out what is going on!  Just make sure to include the following:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [NetworkInfo Log](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
